诗云客户端-description: Work alone or with a team, undisturbed, enjoy a good life
免费的本地及私有化数据存储诗云服务端: Free local and private data storage Shy Server
安装在那里数据存那里: Where is it installed, the data exists there
诗云服务端是什么-answer:
Shy Server is software, just like Shy client.
Shy Server is a server backend that is responsible for data reading and storage of Shy client.
Set the newly created space storage data source to the installed Shy Server, and the data generated in the newly created space will be automatically synchronized to the Shy Server.
诗云服务端与本地笔记软件有什么区别: What is the difference between Shy Server and local note-taking software?
诗云服务端与本地笔记软件有什么区别-answer:
Both can store data locally, but the use of Shy server is more flexible, it can meet local LAN collaboration and support private deployment.
During installation, the database will be automatically installed, which can well support data tables and facilitate data backup, allowing everyone to better manage their data.
It must be admitted that the installation process may be more complicated, but it only needs to be installed once, and the experience after installation is the same as the cloud.
诗云服务端使用场景: What are the use cases of Shy Server?
诗云服务端使用场景-answer: Shi Yun Server Usage Scenario - Answer
连接诗云服务端有什么限制: Are there any restrictions on connecting to Shy Server?
连接诗云服务端有什么限制-answer:
Please ensure that the network is connected
The connected clients can be Shy client, web site, and mobile app. The subsequent mini-programs may not be supported.

诗云与其它产品付费区别: What is the difference between Shy and other  products?
诗云与本地免费的区别: What is the difference between Shy and local free products?
诗云与本地免费的区别-description:
Shy supports local, LAN, and self-built server for free, with similar functionality to the cloud.
Other local free products generally only support single-user and do not support multi-person collaboration.
订阅付费与按量计费的区别: What is the difference between subscription payment and pay-as-you-go?
订阅付费与按量计费的区别-description:
Shy charges based on the resources consumed by the space, and paid spaces have no payment requirements for participants.
Other products are charged based on the number of collaborators, the more collaborators, the higher the cost
如仍然有问题请至: If you still have questions, please go to
诗云的云端免费额度-answer:
The cloud has 200M of free traffic, and the collaboration space cannot be publicly shared on the Internet, but the pages can be shared with anyone.
Some paid features are not available, such as Shy AI.
If you want to use it for free, it is recommended to choose local storage, which has no restrictions.
The cloud is billed on a pay-as-you-go basis, with a minimum recharge of 99 yuan, and you can use it for a long time with one recharge.
我如何为我的团队进行购买: How can I make a purchase for my team?
我如何为我的团队进行购买-answer:
Shy is billed based on usage and does not charge based on the number of collaborators.
Team members need to recharge on their own.
Shy will provide group purchase functionality, which can be used to recharge team members.
诗云AI的免费额度: What is the free quota for Shy AI?
诗云AI的免费额度-answer: Shy AI currently does not have a free quota. Shy AI is based on Wenyan Yixin or GPT.
有什么优惠活动-answer: There will be a series of related discount activities, please pay attention to the official website
诗云AI如何使用我的数据: How does Shy AI use my data?
诗云AI如何使用我的数据-answer: Shy uses third-party AI, and if you use AI, Shy will send the data to the large model.
什么是块-answer: A block is any individual content you add to a page, such as a paragraph of text, a to-do item, an image, a code block, an embedded file, etc. Think of your page as a collection of these building blocks.

你们给学生提供优惠-answer: There is an 20% discount for students, and a student ID is required for verification.

写的更好-description: Improve your writing skills and write with more confidence

ai-AI机器人-description: Customize your AI robot, a brand new human-machine collaboration.
如何激活诗云AI-answer: Shiyun AI is available by default for all users. You can trigger Shiyun AI by using the space key, highlighting the text and selecting 'Shiyun AI', or through slash commands. You can also change the AI model used or disable the AI feature in the space settings.
诗云AI与其他人工智能工具有何不同: What sets Shiyun AI apart from other AI tools?
诗云AI与其他人工智能工具有何不同-answer:
Shiyun AI is not the only AI tool out there, but what makes it special is:
1. When AI is integrated into the places where you already do your work, store your notes and documents, and collaborate with others, it becomes more useful. No need to switch back and forth between notes and separate AI tools.
2. Compared to other tools, Shiyun AI has a unique and highly flexible drag-and-drop text editor that makes it easy to rearrange and transform any AI-generated content. Over time, Shiyun AI will be able to leverage more Shiyun features.
3. Today, Shiyun AI has multiple use cases in your notes and documents. But Shiyun is more than just notes—we'll continue to expand Shiyun AI's capabilities to help with future project management and team knowledge bases. This is just the beginning!
ai-诗云AI如何使用我的数据-answer:
The knowledge content in Shiyun Space is not automatically sent to AI. Only data related to AI will be sent to the large model.
Shiyun currently uses third-party AI, and data transmission cannot be avoided. Please be aware of protecting your privacy while using it.
Shiyun currently integrates GPT, which is only for the research, exploration, and user experience of Shiyun's internal products. It is not recommended for commercial use.
You are responsible for any data security issues caused by your use.
诗云AI有免费试用版吗: Is there a free trial version of Shiyun AI?
诗云AI有免费试用版吗-answer: Shiyun AI supports a certain amount of free trial usage. If you need to use it extensively, it is recommended to recharge.
